page.title: 13TRAFFIC PROBLEMS IN STAFFORD
page.content: The survey showed that 78.5% of our contributors travel by car,and most travel alone.Only 5% walk,and a similar number use the bus.Almost as many use a bicycle.The remainder go by motor cycle or vary their method of transport. {EASING THE TRAFFIC PROBLEMS} 1.More people should share cars,they would save petrol,save parking and space and it would be more friendly. 2.People should be persuaded to use the buses.Weekly tickets are quite cheap, and the mini buses are frequent. 3.Encourage people to cycle to work, they would be much fitter. 4.Many people work for the County Council.If their offices were in the suburbs the traffic would go in different directions. 5.A fly-over or underground railway would be good,but would be expensive.
